الّذي أعلم به الشّيخ أبو مــفرّج وفّقه اللّه توفيق العارفين
وجعله من أوليا أوليائه الصّالحين اللّه الّذين لا خوف عليهم ولا
هم يحزنون وسوى ذلك أنّي سيّرت إلى منكم
أربعة أرادب ونصف وربع شعير وأربعة أرادب قمح
فيتفطّل المولا يقف يقف مع موصل هذه الأحرف
وتبيعها ويبيعها بما طعّم اللّه ورزق وتسلّم ويسلّم له المبلغ
ويسيّر ويسيّر لنا رقعة لأصرف والسّلام عليك ورحمة اللّه وبركاته
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
مملوكه مبارك
وَهي أوّل حوالة بتفطّلك
وإحسانك للّه خير والحمد للّه وحده
ولا تَعوقه عن حمّاله ولا نأخذتاحد تأخذ منه نقص إن بقي شي

I write to inform the Shaykh [Abū Mu]farrij - may God make him successful in the same manner as those who have acquired Divine Knowledge!
May God make him among God's Friends, no fear shall be on them,
I have [sent] to you neither shall they sorrow! - and so forth. [And now to the main topic:] I have [sent] to [one of the associates?] of you
four and a half and a quarter irdabbs of barley, and four irdabbs of wheat.
Du, der Patron, mögest so freundlich sein, dem Überbringer dieses Schreibens beizustehen. Would the Master please assist the carrier of this letter Would the Master please endorse this letter with its carrier,
and sell ... sell them (i.e. the crops) ... and hand him the proceeds (al-mablagh). sell them (i.e. the crops) - as God has fed and provided - and hand him the proceeds.
Please send us a memo (ruqʿa) so I can cash (or change, li-aṣrifa) the money. ... Please send us a memo so I can cash the money. Peace be upon you and God's mercy and blessings.
In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
His servant Mubārak.
Hereby is the first certificate of transfer of debt (awwal ḥawāla). [Please pay it in full] by your grace Hereinabove is the first certificate of transfer of debt. [Please pay it in full] by your grace this is the first order of payment; please deliver it as requested.....
and benevolence. ... and benevolence. [...] Blessings are from God. Praise be to God alone.
Do not hold it back from the carrier! Do not accept, if any, shortages [in the delivery]! we will not withhold...; nor will we accept....
